description: This model tests the [`KHR_materials_unlit`](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/tree/master/extensions/2.0/Khronos/KHR_materials_unlit) extension.  There are two objects, one orange-ish (`#FF7F00` in sRGB space) and one blue-ish (`#007FFF` in sRGB space).  The visible surface of these two objects should appear as a uniform color, so much so that the 3D effect is intentionally lost.
name: Unlit Test
summary: Tests if the KHR_materials_unlit extension is supported properly.
